api_list.name: Query for Postal Code Boundary By location
api_list.description: Query for Postal Code By location

api_list.name: Query for all State names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/state/names"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query for Postal Code Boundary by postal code.
api_list.description: Query For Postal Code Boundary by postal code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/postalcode/{postalcode}"

    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query for City Names by State
api_list.description: Query for list of city names by a state name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/city/state/{state}/names"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Query for City Boundary by Name
api_list.description: Query for City Boundary by City Name

import requests

url = "https://de-boundaries-io1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/city/{name}"
